paragraphs.text:
%md
# **SnapBook**

by Anish Singh
blog site : [Zeppelin Notes](http://zeppelinnotes.blogspot.in)
[Image]

## Introduction

The introduction appears here

result.msg:
SnapBook

by Anish Singh
blog site : Zeppelin Notes
[Image]

Introduction

The introduction appears here

paragraphs.text:
//attempt to load the social networking data for a particular ego user - this paragraph only loads the data

val rawFeatr = sc.textFile("/home/anish/ZeppelinData/SNAP/facebook/0.feat")                 //load the features for other users
val rawEdges = sc.textFile("/home/anish/ZeppelinData/SNAP/facebook/0.edges")                //load the edges file
val rawCicle = sc.textFile("/home/anish/ZeppelinData/SNAP/facebook/0.circles")              //load the circles file
val rawEFeat = sc.textFile("/home/anish/ZeppelinData/SNAP/facebook/0.egofeat")              //load the file for the ego features for the ego user
val featName = sc.textFile("/home/anish/ZeppelinData/SNAP/facebook/0.featnames")            //load the names of features for the users

result.msg:
rawFeatr: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[1] at textFile at <console>:31
rawEdges: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[3] at textFile at <console>:29
rawCicle: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[5] at textFile at <console>:29
rawEFeat: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[7] at textFile at <console>:29
featName: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[9] at textFile at <console>:29

The feature labels of the ego user are :-

education;classes;id education;concentration;id education;school;id education;school;id education;school;id education;type education;type education;type education;year;id gender last_name locale location;id work;employer;id work;employer;id work;employer;id work;employer;id work;end_date work;end_date work;end_date work;end_date work;location;id work;position;id work;position;id work;start_date work;start_date work;start_date work;start_date work;start_date work;start_date

paragraphs.title: Largest Circle Features by User ID

result.msg:
